short_summary: The Solicitation gives notice by the Fisheries and Oceans Canada of opportunity to offer maintenance and repaire services fo vehicles of the Canada Department to be establish in the Province of Quebec.
description: According to the scheduled inspections and/or according to the Project Manager's requests, a 24-hour deadline for a verification appointment during the requests must be respected and the repairs made as quickly as possible according to the availability and the seriousness of the repairs required. Moreover, the repair reports must be documented properly, including details about oil changes, maintenance, and repairs performed. The Provider must keep a record of all services and work orders and allow access to this information in case of a review. Also, a semester to year report must be provided quarterly to establish the status of the seize of work,
